DOC.brief_summary: This study comparison efficacy safety paricalcitol injection maxacalcitol injection adult Japanese chronic kidney disease patient receive hemodialysis secondary hyperparathyroidism . The main objective study demonstrate efficacy paricalcitol injection reduce level parathyroid hormone without clinically significant hypercalcemia , compare maxacalcitol injection .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Safety Paricalcitol Injection With Maxacalcitol Injection Adult Japanese Chronic Kidney Disease Subjects Receiving Hemodialysis With Secondary Hyperparathyroidism
DOC.criteria: Adult Chronic Kidney Disease ( CKD ) Stage 5 patient undergoing dialysis stable dialysate calcium phosphate binder On three time weekly hemodialysis least 3 month prior intact parathyroid hormone ( iPTH ) great equal 300 pg/mL , adjust normalized serum total calcium ( Ca ) great equal 8.4 less 10.2 mg/dL , serum phosphorus ( P ) less equal 6.5 mg/dL . Patients recent history severe cardiovascular hepatic disease , uncontrolled hypertension uncontrolled diabetes Patients receive parathyroidectomy ethanol infusion within prior year Patients take drug affect iPTH , calcium bone metabolism Patients need take chronic dos ( great equal 2 consecutive week ) cytochrome P450 inhibitor ( e.g. , clarithromycin , grapefruit product ) inducer ( e.g. , carbamazepine , rifampicin ) Female patient pregnant , possibly pregnant , wish become pregnant , participate breastfeed study period .
